title: Who Rules the World
overview: Hei Feng Xi is handsome and elegant while Bai Feng Xi is majestic and unrestrained. Opposites attract as both are unrivaled in skill. Caught in the warfare and chaos of the martial arts world, the flowers of love begin to bloom amidst the blood that has been sacrificed in the last ten years. They join hands, traveling the world seeking justice. Will their love bring peace to a chaotic world?
